ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Patty, at level 12 i spent alot of my time in lavastorm, but that would be hardfor you to get to seeing as how you arent an evil race. You can go to Befallen
ygData.messageBody:
Patty,

at level 12 i spent alot of my time in lavastorm, but that would be hardfor
you to get to seeing as how you arent an evil race. You can go to Befallen
and collect mass loot there by rnning around and killing everything! if you
want to party with a caster go to the island in eruds crossing...there are
tons of wisps there and they give greater and regular lightstones....all you
have to do is sit there and take the damage then split the cash you get
form the lightstnes. about 4 plat from a vendor or you can get 5 from a
player. Other than that you could venture to Guk and look for netted and
woven armor to sell to players, if you are lucky you can get 5 plat per item
(woven) or a little less for netted. Anyone of those are good money makers,
just make sure you are in a party.
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]

> Subject: [warriors_eq] Armor
>
> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> I am a brave warrior of the 12th Rank. Although I have a fine steel long
> sword, I can't seem to get enough loot to buy any decent armor. I am in
> east commons now headed back to Halas and I only have 10 plat in the bank.
>
> Help! Where should I be hunting to get loot!
>
> p.s. On top of that, I know once I get decent armor it will weigh me down.
>
> What is avalible at higher ranks to increase my strength (currently a
> paltry
> 130)?
>
